s1.title: Cocoon Tips and Guides (English)
s1.p: Here you can find various tips, tutorials and guides on specific cocoon-related topics spread all over the internet. Unless otherwise explicitly noted, all documents refer to the 2.x series of Cocoon.

ul.li:
Introduction to Cocoon 2
Introduction to Cocoon 2 is a tutorial by Leigh Dodds, published on IBM developerWorks site.

Working with XML Server Pages in Apache Cocoon 2
Working with XML Server Pages in Apache Cocoon 2 is another tutorial by Leigh Dodds, published on IBM developerWorks site.

li.link: Differences between Cocoon and Avalon Excalibur Source Resolving (Ziegeler)

ul.li:
Galatea FlashGuide: Cocoon2 Tips and Tricks by Lajos Moczar
This FlashGuideTM provides various tips and tricks for Cocoon2, e. g. database pooling, running multiple instances of Cocoon, and removing 'cocoon' from your URL base.

XSP Tutorial by David Perry
A tutorial describing what XSP pages are and how to create them.

Deploying Cocoon 2 in JBoss
An installation guide for Cocoon with the JBoss application server.

s1.title: How to get listed
s1.p: If you do not find your page here, make sure you tell us. Enter a meaningful title after the words "Link: Guide:" in the subject, provide a short summary of your page, and do not forget to tell us the URL. You could also follow the Contributing page to make it easier for everyone.
